name: Zippy
body:
# jQuery plugin ZippyShare Zippyshare embed using jQuery. ## Quick use ```html
``` ```js // http://www26.zippyshare.com/v/XVcARUzL/file.html $("#player").zippy({ www: 26, file: "XVcARUzL", auto: true }); ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
